TopicTitle: Do you have a screenshot that makes you laugh every time?

Articles.Content: Hey Rodent, welcome to the forums. I love that shot! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

[Kerbal Truck Simulator 2](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/131253-Ford-Kraptor-Pickup-Truck-Low-part-airdrop-capable-ejection-seats?goto=newpost) in production, thanks to the incredible BlueCanary ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

A continuation of my April Fool's Twitter reply to SCS Software, the makers of the real Euro Truck Simulator series ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![XI8kr3K.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/XI8kr3K.jpg)

[http://i83.photobucket.com/albums/j314/Goof112/screenshot12.png](http://i83.photobucket.com/albums/j314/Goof112/screenshot12.png)

The Leaning-too-much Tower of Pisa?

> 
> [http://i83.photobucket.com/albums/j314/Goof112/screenshot12.png](http://i83.photobucket.com/albums/j314/Goof112/screenshot12.png)
> The Leaning-too-much Tower of Pisa?

Heh, that's about what happened to me when I tried to land a similar habitat module on top of the munar arch.

> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/uRFbvPZ.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/uRFbvPZ.png?1)

> 
> Hey Rodent, welcome to the forums. I love that shot! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Indeed, it's great.

We should open a thread for sky drawings like this one.

A chief artificersmate (aka 3-star engineer) "salvaging" a now-useless parachute off a big Duna rover. It doesn't look like he saved anything from that ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

[![20333738070_3e7883ca3f_b.jpg](https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5666/20333738070_3e7883ca3f_b.jpg)](https://flic.kr/p/wYPHUS)

> 
> *Nailed it!*
> ![Z0VAC2J.png](http://i.imgur.com/Z0VAC2J.png)

The caption that pops to mind when I see that pic is "Scientific Progress Goes 'Boink!'"

Sometimes it's best to know as early as possible that an ascent will not go well.

![screenshot964.png](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/61004449/KSP/1.0.4/screenshot964.png)

> 
> Kerbal Pool Program
> [http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/41982056250505558/F8A95C7851872057E4B3F991B3E586F3BF09BDB7/](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/41982056250505558/F8A95C7851872057E4B3F991B3E586F3BF09BDB7/)

My favorite so far

I found this gem today.

![8jEhlcy.png](http://i.imgur.com/8jEhlcy.png)

Look at Jeb's "eyebrows". ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I should archive my screenshots or something. I need to be a better historian! Then, I can get one of said screenshots that makes me laugh, and post it in this thread. 

So: No. But, I'm going to get some.

Took this one over a year ago. Still makes me chuckle

![ApuHtCV.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ApuHtCV.jpg)

Kerbal Automotive Program.. hahahaha

![c8vQbIq.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/c8vQbIq.jpg)

> 
> My favorite so far

Indeed, that is the best one. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Real Kerbals don't look at explosions. 

Yes, the little car annihilated a 354 part massive rover after side swiping one of its (tomato and onion) wheels.

![D3rGsj6.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/D3rGsj6.jpg)

> 
> [http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/638690KSPMunCastle01sig.jpg](http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/638690KSPMunCastle01sig.jpg)

> 
> That is cheating, sir!

![271642caluMny.jpg](http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/271642caluMny.jpg)

![sURx6Nq.jpg?1](http://i.imgur.com/sURx6Nq.jpg?1)

Done quite some time ago for a small "challenge". He died about 2 seconds after taking the shot.

> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/sURx6Nq.jpg?1](http://i.imgur.com/sURx6Nq.jpg?1)
> Done quite some time ago for a small "challenge". He died about 2 seconds after taking the shot.

At least he died doing what he loved. Just look at that big dumb grin!

Might work better with landing gear instead of rover wheels.

- - - Updated - - -

Also, I just noticed the radial decoupler--am I looking at a rocket car with an *ejection seat*? Now I have to go try that...

Xeldrak's rocket car has inspired me.

Here is Jeb in a rocket car, because Jeb is straight-up crazy.

![screenshot290.png](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-GL0vKEhgA2w/VdGa2R9BPOI/AAAAAAAABgg/aCV-QHtj9Z0/s800-Ic42/screenshot290.png)

The rocket car has an ejection seat, because he may be crazy, but he's not stupid. At least, not *that* stupid.

![screenshot292.png](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-Tm5Iz386BN4/VdGa3mDRZuI/AAAAAAAABgo/pesxOKROWHs/s800-Ic42/screenshot292.png)

![esThtY7.png](http://i.imgur.com/esThtY7.png)

"You guys go ahead and experiment with rocket fuel in there. I'll be outside..." - *Val Kerman*

> 
> http://i.imgur.com/8VV7Vuw.png
> http://www.indiedb.com/games/ardent-seas '>http://i.imgur.com/8VV7Vuw.png
> 
> http://www.indiedb.com/games/ardent-seas

came here to see funny pics.

left here to play a funny game

i dont know maybe its just the fact that you know that there upside down because of the window and all the kerbals scared but the happy middle kerbal looking down (or up) gets me everytime

![F6GeTbR.png](http://i.imgur.com/F6GeTbR.png)

![2Orwws2.png](http://i.imgur.com/2Orwws2.png)

Yeah, that's supposed to be a CSM...

Long story short, the LEM's engine broke down in Mun orbit, but I was bored of stuff failing so I decided to leave it in orbit, land and re-orbit the CSM instead, and refuel once I was back in orbit.

The Kerbal tower is just the icing on the cake. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

***YOU CAN'T TELL ME WHAT TO DO!***

Do short videos count?
